definition: roof tile/abbr. for 瓦特[wa3 te4]

sentences.english: The system's capability can be expanded to provide up to 30 kilowatts of AC power for use in the field.
sentences.chinese: 在野外，該系統最高可以提供30千瓦交流電源。

sentences.english: When completed, the power station will have two 25,000 kw generators.
sentences.chinese: 這座發電廠建成後將有兩臺兩萬五千千瓦的發電機。

sentences.english: He satisfiedly seeing at her, the double eye of evil malign morale puts the mighty cordless current of 1,000 tiles.
sentences.chinese: 他得意的看着她，邪魅的雙眼放着一千瓦的強電流。

sentences.english: In this 9% share, hydro power installed capacity contributed 172 thousand megawatt, world's biggest, and wind power 12.17 thousand megawatt, world's fourth.
sentences.chinese: 風電裝機爲1217萬千瓦，居世界第四位。

sentences.english: This adds up more than 5,000 kWp of installed solar power.
sentences.chinese: 太陽能發電總裝機容量超過5000千瓦。

sentences.english: Based on an assumption of three hours of use per day at 11 cents per kilowatt-hour.
sentences.chinese: 假設每天使用3小時，每千瓦時花費11美分。
用40千瓦這個尺度來劃分。

sentences.english: A typical radio transmitter has a power of 100 kilowatts.
sentences.chinese: 一臺典型的無線電發射功率爲100千瓦。

sentences.english: Watts and kilowatts are the units in which electric power is measured.
sentences.chinese: 瓦和千瓦是電的功率計量單位。

sentences.english: A mathematical model for a 200mw power unit is briefly described in this paper.
sentences.chinese: 本文爲20萬千瓦發電機組數學模型工作的簡要總結。

sentences.english: The G5 Series Laser Process Head is designed for High-Speed Multi-Kilowatt Cutting Applications.
sentences.chinese: G5系列激光加工頭是專爲高速多千瓦切割應用設計。

sentences.english: Its first 100-kilowatt unit went to Google.
sentences.chinese: 它的最先100千瓦電池賣給了谷歌。

sentences.english: Just recently, we implemented a 180.000 kilowatt project of wind-power generation.
sentences.chinese: 我們最近就在越南落實了18萬千瓦的風電項目。

sentences.english: Generating the pressure needed to do this sieving consumes about 4kWh per cubic metre of water.
sentences.chinese: 篩化每立方水所需要的壓力將消耗4千瓦小時的能量。

sentences.english: B: Ten thousand KWH each day.

definition: to generate electricity/to send a telegram
power output (of an electrical device etc)
